skill.name: ngx-hybrid-sales
skill.description: Framework completo para venta de HYBRID. Use para calificar leads, preparar llamadas de venta, manejar objeciones y analizar pipeline.

skill.author: 270aldo

security_audit.summary: All 19 static findings are false positives caused by an over-sensitive pattern matcher. The skill contains only markdown documentation for sales frameworks - no code execution, no file system access, no network requests, and no external commands. Safe for marketplace publication.

content.value_statement: Help sales teams qualify leads between HYBRID ($199/mo) and ASCEND ($99/mo) products. Provides complete call frameworks, objection handling scripts, and qualification scoring systems.
actual_capabilities: Calculate HYBRID vs ASCEND suitability scores
limitations: Does not integrate with CRM systems
Does not automate email or calendar tasks
Does not provide customer data storage
Does not connect to payment processors

use_cases.title: Qualify new leads
use_cases.description: Use scoring framework to determine if leads are HYBRID or ASCEND candidates

use_cases.title: Train sales teams
use_cases.description: Provide call scripts and objection handling guides for consistent team performance

use_cases.title: Optimize sales process
use_cases.description: Implement structured call flows and track pipeline metrics for premium product sales

prompt_templates.title: Qualify new lead
prompt_templates.prompt: Qualify this lead for HYBRID vs ASCEND. Lead info: [name], [background], [goals]. Apply the 5-question framework and calculate score.

prompt_templates.title: Prepare objection response
prompt_templates.prompt: Prepare response to objection: 'It's too expensive'. Lead context: [describe lead's situation and budget]. Use NGX framework.

prompt_templates.title: Structure discovery call
prompt_templates.prompt: Outline a discovery call structure for [lead name]. Focus on: connection, discovery, agitation, solution, offer, close.

prompt_templates.title: Calculate lead score
prompt_templates.prompt: Score this lead: multiple prior failures (-3), autodiscipline 5/10, prefers guidance, budget $200+, age 52. Calculate total and recommend product.

output_examples.input: Qualify lead: Maria, 48, tried 3 programs that failed, says discipline is 4/10, prefers step-by-step guidance, budget $250/mo, event is daughter's wedding in 6 months
output: Key objection prep: Too expensive - reference prior spending of $1,000-2,000 on failed programs

output_examples.input: Lead says 'I need to think about it' - how do I respond?
output: Ask: What specifically do you need to think about?
Add urgency: I can hold your spot for 48 hours only
Close the loop: People who 'think about it' usually don't act
If budget concern: Compare to what they spent on failed attempts before

best_practices: Use the 5-question qualification framework before every call to identify lead needs
Calculate scoring before calls to anticipate which product fits best
Prepare objection responses based on lead profile before each conversation
anti_patterns: Skip qualification and go straight to pitch without understanding lead needs
Offer HYBRID to highly disciplined leads who would succeed with ASCEND
Ignore budget signals when recommending between products

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. No additional setup required.

faq.question: What is the scoring threshold?
faq.answer: 0-4 points = ASCEND, 5-8 points = HYBRID candidate, 9+ points = HYBRID strong.

faq.question: Does it integrate with CRMs?
faq.answer: No. This is a prompt-based skill for call guidance. Integrate manually or use separate CRM tools.

faq.question: Is customer data stored?
faq.answer: No. The skill provides frameworks only. All lead data remains in your conversation context.

faq.question: Why does the skill ask about prior failures?
faq.answer: This identifies leads who need accountability and coaching support, making HYBRID the better fit.

faq.question: How does HYBRID differ from ASCEND?
faq.answer: HYBRID includes weekly human coaching ($199/mo). ASCEND is self-directed AI only ($99/mo).
